summary: Small and easy mod that changes the the housecarls to use the their gender\'s stance.
descriptionHtml:
Always wondered why Bethesda chose to make the housecarls, well the female ones so man-like. I mean I understand northern female warriors were supposed to be strong (referring of what I\'ve seen in movies about vikings), but still maybe a bit too exaggerated in their stance. From now on your favorite housecarls will use the female stance and animations, if any. 

Since it\'s a simple CK modification, I\'ve seen other mods that do the same (before you all tell me that), mine just adds compatibility with the Hearthfire housecarls, so Hearthfire is a requirement. Haven\'t advanced in Dawnguard to see if anything needs modifying as well.

[b][color=green]Affected NPCs:[/b][/color]

Lydia - Whiterun\'s Housecarl
Jordis the Sword-Maiden - Solitude\'s Housecarl
Iona - Riften\'s Housecarl
Rayya - Falkreath\'s Housecarl

Mjoll the Lioness
Jenassa

[b][color=green]Requirements:[/b][/color]
Skyrim with latest patch (might work on previous version, I don\'t see why it wouldn\'t)
Heartfire DLC

[b][color=green]Instructions:[/b][/color]
Download via NMM or if you prefer to do it manually, extract and copy the .esp file to your Data folder (default: \"C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\")

[b][color=green]Known Issues:[/b][/color]
It might conflict with mods that change the housecarls (e.g. appearances). [b][color=red]To avoid this put my mod before UFO and any other mod that changes female housecarl attributes[/b][/color], so that any mod that comes after will overwrite this.

What\'s there left to say, have fun!
author: eSoDian
